/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the street, looking towards the horizon. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The buildings in the background add an urban touch to the otherwise natural landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
